column4: how do we do an alias that add some command options at the end of the alias but this command needs like a filename before the options? like comand filename options_that_i_want_to_make_automatic
that's the point where you want to create a script rather than an alias
isnt there something like a variable in the alias that is initializated when we are going to execute the command?
not in the alias that comes builtin in bash (at least not to my knowledge)
